Episodes.Title: The Entertainer
Episodes.Plot: Fran buys a piano and starts taking lessons, discovering she has no talent whatsoever - meanwhile Bernard falls in love and tries desperately to impress her. Between them, they con Manny into throwing away a hard-earned break to help them out.

Episodes.Title: Fever
Episodes.Plot: As the temperature creeps slowly towards 88 degrees, Manny desperately seeks out new ways to stay cool, lest he trigger his "Dave syndrome." Meanwhile an unsympathetic Bernard falls hopelessly in love with Fran's new neighbour, who is unknowingly taking over Fran's apartment.
Episodes.Writer: Dylan Moran, Andy Riley, Kevin Cecil

Episodes.Title: The Fixer
Episodes.Plot: Bernard and Manny need to teach a psychotic ex-con to read in three days after agreeing to host his reading and book-signing in the shop. Fran gets a new job and all seems to be going well until some miscommunication when Manny calls in a favour...
Episodes.GuestStars: Rob Brydon, Big Mick, Ricky Grover

Episodes.Title: Blood
Episodes.Plot: When Manny is drawn into a competing bookstore by its customer-friendly atmosphere, he convinces Bernard the shop needs an overhaul. Fran makes use of the shop's improved facilities to track down her relatives, but is not entirely happy with what she finds.
Episodes.Writer: Dylan Moran, Andy Riley, Kevin Cecil
Episodes.GuestStars: Mark Donovan, Vincenzo Nicoli, Diana Hull, Louise Winstone, Andrew Collins, Nigel Harrison

Episodes.Title: Hello Sun
Episodes.Plot: Fran starts spending time with a new-age friend to try and wind down while Bernard and Manny are having another fight. Bernard believes Manny is a psychopath and sends him to a therapist, where he unlocks a confidence he never knew he had.

Episodes.Title: A Nice Change
Episodes.Plot: Bernard and Manny can't hear themselves argue because the shop next door is undergoing some round-the-clock construction. The noise drives Bernard, Manny and Fran up the wall. So Fran suggests a holiday. Bernard and Manny find baggage in her luggage. There's nothing in the crisp packet and Manny's pants aren't that easy to fold. Will the customer crack the system? What happens on the riverboat? Just how many monkeys are missing in Canada?
